description: This Dart file defines FavoritesProvider, a class managing favorite recipe IDs in a Flutter application. It handles loading, updating, and persisting favorites using an external FavoritesStore, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: FavoritesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing favorite recipe IDs, supporting loading from storage, toggling favorites, and notifying listeners of state changes.

methods.name: loadFromStore
methods.description: Loads favorite recipe IDs from persistent storage into memory, handling errors.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if a given recipe ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a recipe ID, updating persistent storage and notifying listeners.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Internal method to set loading state and notify listeners.
